SELECT
FROM jc_product a
AND a.title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' '%'+#{title}+'%' concat('%',#{title},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jc_product( nav_id, nav_parent, pic_path, title, context, path, is_show, add_user_id, add_time, update_user_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{navId}, #{navParent}, #{picPath}, #{title}, #{context}, #{path}, #{isShow}, #{addUserId}, #{addTime}, #{updateUserId}, #{updateTime} )
